Welcome to munchou-p13's documentation!
=======================================

Please note that the app was made in Windows 10 64bit, therefore the documentation focuses on that environment.
If you are a Linux or macOS user, please adapt the steps accordingly.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Project description <1-project_desc>
   Installing the app and necessary tools <2-installation>
   Quickstart: running the app <3-apprun>
   Database and models' structure <4-database>
   Description of the API <5-api>
   User guide with use cases <6-use_cases>
   CI/CD Pipeline <7-cicd>
